description.ko: 완벽한 질서가 아름답고 파편화된 혼돈으로 붕괴하는 전이의 순간을 KURO-X의 철학으로 시각화했습니다.
description.en: A visual representation of KURO-X's philosophy: the moment of transition where perfect order collapses into beautiful, fragmented chaos.

prompt: A brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian monolith undergoing a violent geometric deconstruction in a sterile #FFFFFF digital vacuum. Sharp, recursive #808080 and #C0C0C0 polygonal shards are frozen in mid-explosion, creating a chaotic storm of data corruption. Intense digital glitch artifacts, scanlines, and heavy chromatic aberration cut through the composition. High-contrast cinematic lighting reveals razor-sharp raytraced reflections on fragmented glass-like surfaces. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 aesthetic, precise mathematical chaos.
